reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits slim to the body and is perfect for fall and winter weddings. The dress is well-made, comfortable, and flattering, with one customer noting it hugs in all the right places. The fabric quality receives mixed feedback, with some customers finding it nice while others describe it as cheap. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress - no pockets
items.body: Love this dresses. I am a 38H and it fit well and looked great. The under dress is more fitted and gives a hint of shape wear while the outer shear covering is a little looser. This dress is very forgiving. Be careful, I snagged mine on a chair screw and it ripped a big hole. I would order this again for sure! Read more
items.author: ShananD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Just Buy It!!!! Amazing dress fits perfectly, flattery, sexy, effortless elegance and lightweight. Guaranteed to get many compliments. I weigh 123 pounds and got small size. Perfect fit. Read more
items.author: opionated

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems true to size; very classy
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! Purchased for party celebrating recently married couple. Perfect fit for me, very flattering; fitted to show off your figure but not too tight. Looks stunning! So looking forward to wearing this dress! I am 5’4 112 lbs; purchased XSmall in black with khaki/brown flower design. Read more
items.author: Pam Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect. Exactly what I was looking for!
items.body: Love this dress! fits well and is comfortable. Fabric was stretchy but not too clingy. This will be great for the fall wedding I am attending. It's not too tight but looks fitted. The style is great. I recommend this dress. Looks pretty versatile as well. Read more
items.author: Eleanor Lilliquist

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Dress!
items.body: This dress is exactly what I was hoping for -- fitted but not too tight, lightweight (could definitely wear on cooler spring/summer evenings), and very flattering. I'm 5'5" and 142 pounds, and a Medium fits perfectly. I do wish it was slightly longer so that I could wear heels with it, but it'll still work for me and I'm overall thrilled with it. Great dress for the price! Read more
items.author: LeeChristopher

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fit
items.body: Beautiful dress, but more suited to a taller and slender person, and maybe spring or summer. Read more
items.author: Donna M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive & comfortable
items.body: Happy with this purchase. Certainly a dress you can dress up and down. Comfortable and you can wash and hand to dry and is just as new and dries faily fast, too. Although long sleeves you can till use for a night out on mid 70s temperature and if its cooler you can use it with a nice shawl or coat. Read more
items.author: Teresa DeJesus Arcay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is a must buy!!
items.body: Yeah, I am 5'4". I weigh 135. I bought a size medium. It was an absolute perfect fit. The quality of this dress is perfect. Absolutely perfect. This is a dress that you would wear to an engagement party, wedding or any kind of party really, it is a beautiful dress. The material is sheer, but there is an under piece that comes with, that fits slim to your body. It does have stretch to it. Very pleased with this dress. Read more
items.author: Bebe

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Formal Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Formal Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black and Pink, Wine Red, Pink, Brown and Black, Polkadot, Dark Blue, Leopard, Black, Yellow Black, Black and Red, Black and Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
